text: Spin Master is a Canadian toy and entertainment company. It is in Toronto, Ontario, Canada. They have shows like Curious George at the Zoo, PAW Patrol, Rubble & Crew, Little Charmers, and Abby Hatcher. Chase the police pup and Marshall the firefighting pup, two characters from the PAW Patrol franchise, are the company's mascots. ==References == Category:1994 establishments in Canada Category:Canadian entertainment companies Category:Companies based in Toronto
title: Spin Master
